snippet: The struggling financial industry is laying off workers, and those beginning their careers are bearing the brunt of the job cuts and the inevitable loss of status.

snippet: Quicken, the popular personal-finance software, will not work on the latest versions of Apple's Mac operating system. Users of the application have some limited options, but options nonetheless.

snippet: After a tumultuous 16 months, Meg Whitman, the new chief executive of the technology company, said it would rebuild, focusing on development of its existing businesses.
abstract: Hewlett-Packard reports fourth-quarter profit of $200 million, or 12 cents a share, down 91 percent from $2.5 billion, or $1.10 a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $32.1 billion, down 3 percent from $33.3 billion.

headline.main: Hewlett’s Profit Falls 91%, but It Beats Expectations
headline.print_headline: Hewlett’s Profit Falls 91%, But It Beats Expectations

snippet: Apple will become the top PC maker in the world in the second half of next year, when iPad sales are factored into the equation, the research firm Canalys predicted in a new report.
abstract: Apple will become the top PC maker in the world in the second half of next year, when iPad sales are factored into the equation, the research firm Canalys predicted in a new report.

headline.main: With iPad Boost, Apple Set to Become Top PC Vendor

snippet: Apple will become the top PC maker in the world in the second half of next year, when iPad sales are factored into the equation, the research firm Canalys predicted in a new report. But to achieve that distinction, the firm said, Apple will need t...
abstract: Apple will become the top PC maker in the world in the second half of next year, when iPad sales are factored into the equation, the research firm Canalys predicted in a new report. But to achieve that distinction, the firm said, Apple will need to release a new iPad that boosts sales.

headline.main: With iPad Boost, Apple Set to Become Top PC Vendor

snippet: Vicks VapoRub uses Drew Brees, the quarterback of the New Orleans Saints, in a campaign that emphasizes his role as a father.

headline.main: How Do VapoRub Ads Spell Relief? ‘D-A-D’
